data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Zhi-Sheng, Zhu, Ming-Sheng, Wang, Xin-Ping (2005): Draconarius exilis, a new species of coelotine spider from China (Araneae, Amaurobiidae). Zootaxa 1057: 45-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170115
